biotools.summary:
A novel threading algorithm with predicted contacts.

CATHER is a threading algorithm for template-based modeling. It uses an iterative algorithm to combine both sequential information and contact maps to improve the threading performance. For a submitted query protein sequence, the returned results include the predicted structure

bioschemas.name: CATHER
